step_data.thought:
I'm now on the Credit Memos page, which is exactly what I need to manage customer refunds. Looking at the page, I can see that there is 1 credit memo record found (as indicated by '1 records found' text). The table shows a single credit memo with the following details:

- Credit Memo #: 000000001
- Created: Apr 19, 2023 12:15:47 PM
- Order #: 000000002
- Bill-to Name: Veronica Costello
- Status: Refunded
- Refunded Amount: USD 39.64

To view the details of this credit memo, I can click on the 'View' link in the Action column. This will show me the complete details of this refund. The 'View' link has bid 1556.
